question: Which of the following graphs represents the variation of magnetic field B with perpendicular distance 'r' from an infinitely long, straight conductor carrying current?
images/c5d6e7f8-a9b0-4c1d-2e3f-4a5b6c7d8e9f.png
explanation: For an infinitely long straight wire, $B = \frac{\mu_0 I}{2\pi r}$.
This relationship is represented by a rectangular hyperbola (Graph 2).
